EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Quick access to your recently copied text

WELCOME_MESSAGE.message: Thanks for installing Clipps, the extension that lets you access your recent clipboard history. To get started:

TUTORIAL_STEP_1.message: Copy text from any web page.

TUTORIAL_STEP_2.message: When you want to view your recent clipboard history, right-click anywhere to access the context menu or click on the extension icon and choose Clipboard.

TUTORIAL_STEP_3.message: Click on an item in the list to copy it back to your clipboard.
